creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: seated man holding a strand of white beads in his PR hand; both hands hidden in the sleeves of his grey kimono; outer sleeveless garment of blue; man looks toward ULC at two flying birds; shadowy reddish-purple floral cartouches at top 1/4 of image; unsigned
marks:
Inscription

[中村歌右衛門　浪花中寺町浄国寺　法名妙法院翫雀歌曲信士　二月十七日
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Nakamura Utaemon IV
